text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeeaah～…… Guess you can't read it
when it's that messed up. Wonder what
it said.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: "〇％×＃、＄＊△＆□ Ψ∂∂Ψ、ΦωΦ——" Greetings, earthling! Thanks for the other day!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, what a marvelous message☆ 
Then I'll reply with ——

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Wow, I wasn't able to read any of it!
But wait…… who's that you're messaging
～!?
